creator: marussi@alemar.it
text:
a module call to mysql_init() give this error:
Error_log  : child pid xxx exit signal Segmentation Fault (11)

Apache doesn't call mysql_init().  If there's a bug, report it to whoever is
responsible for packaging whatever you're using with it.  If ALL your packages
are from apt-get and family that'll be debian; if not, recompile them from
source first.
creator: nick@webthing.com
